name: Ext_R3_PlanDefinition_ac_code
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.PlanDefinition.action.code for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents PlanDefinition.action.code from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/PlanDefinition|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Code representing the meaning of the action or sub-actions
element.definition: A code that provides meaning for the action or action group. For example, a section may have a LOINC code for a the section of a documentation template.
element.comment: `PlanDefinition.action.code` maps to R5 `PlanDefinition.action.code`. Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
